page.title: 01REVIEW
page.content: The area is{mainly agricultural}with almost 100% of the available farming land being grassland for dairy cattle. Within the area there are two centres of population,the town of Sandbach and the village of Elworth. {Sandbach}is a small market town with a population of appoximately 15,000.It has over the last 20 years expanded considerably.This is due to the fact that it has become a commuter belt which allows people to travel to work in cities such as Manchester, Birmingham and Liverpool within an hour on the nearby M6 motorway. The village of{Elworth}has expanded as a residential area in the past 10 years.Up until 1979 the village contained the main employer (Fodens) for the area.This is not the case now and smaller industries have replaced the large employer.{
